replies.body:
The offline error message is happening to players who have disconnected while in-game, so we need to figure out if your disconnections are on our side or something within your network kicking you off so much.  You've disconnected from quite a few games so far, so try this workaround to rule out the possibilities of the disconnections being on our side's [current issue](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline):

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

Be sure to test it in a custom game though so you don't get anymore leaves!  Let me know if that works out for you.  In the meantime, disconnected we'll also continue working on the offline error messages on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.
